pages.text: Facebook X Instagram RSS Latest News New location coming to Mt Pleasant, SC soon! About Ladles Ladles opened in October 2007. Locally owned and operated, Ladles is a true Charleston grown franchise company. Ladles was established on the goodness of fresh ingredients and strives to live up to our customer’s love of homemade soups and sandwiches. With 12 locations open and more on the way, Ladles offers healthy, hearty, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten free menu items. Follow @LadlesSoups https://www.ladlessoups.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Ladles-15.1.mp4
